short_summary: Provision of scientific services involving acoustic monitoring and evaluation of potential effects on marine mammals.
description: The contract is to provide scientific services for marine mammal monitoring and evaluation of potential effects of demolition and sonar activities. ",
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: EZ113-231568 - Underwater Acoustic Mitigation
==============================================

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3793942832-Doc3825044698
* **Publication Date:** January 13, 2023
* **Closing Date:** February 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** February 26, 2025

### Tender Status

This tender has **expired**.

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Project Description

The Government of Canada requires the provision of scientific services to support acoustic monitoring and evaluation of potential underwater and in-air effects on marine mammals from demolition and sonar activities at various locations. This project is administered through the Supply Arrangement (SA) # EZ113-220119/VIC series.

### Contract Value and Currency

The contract is valued at **CAN $X**, payable in **Canadian dollars**.

### Eligible Suppliers

All Canadian companies holding a valid contracting authority are eligible to bid on this project.

### Mandatory Documents

Submissions must include:

1. Mandatory documents as described in the additional documentation (e.g., Price, Management proposal)
2. Appendices

### Evaluation Criteria

Bidders will be evaluated based on the **lowest price**.

### Surrendering the Tender

The Department reserves the right to cancel or return the tender without any obligation and without reason.

### Additional Information

For more information on this project, please contact:

* Name: Kristen Mikulova
* Position: Technical Administrator
* Email: [kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

You can access the complete tender call on the **Discovery Website** at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15117237?extsite=MTUxMTcyMzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15117237?extsite=MTUxMTcyMzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
